column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I really enjoy a good deep dish
column2: and normally I am greatly satisfied by Lou's yummy pizzas.  However
column3: my last visit was not good.  Pizza was not hot when it hit our table
column4: our drinks were mixed up and our appetizers also came out kinda cold.... I was not too thrilled
column5: not to mention when we told our waitress she didn't really say much... I understand that its ALWAYS busy in there but a little understanding can go a long way....
